document_data.mainbody:
he Dazzling Dolphin was an expensive inn and tavern in the port city of Sapra on the island of Iligh√¥n in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Like the rest of the city, Dazzling Dolphin was immaculately clean. The establishment offered food, drink, and lodging, which cost ten times the average rate. The inn hosted traveling bards allowing performances for tips.
At some point before the , Adamar Session, bard of Starmantle, visited the Dazzling Dolphin during his twelve-year adventuring trek across the Vilhon Reach. The bar noted that despite the hefty price, guests of the Dolphin tipped just as illiberally as they did in Starmantle.
